Text:
And oh yeah, I've left the Chapter/Episode markers in, but not after the teasers but at the beginning of each episode.
Also removed some useless repetitive scene, and there's NO "Making of" bullshit in it either.
If you like this, say thank you.
Ive not even begun the download, but thanks, yes, absolutely to all those like you who bring new content into our lives that we would otherwise never find. It is a great and genuine gift.
